import {React, useState} from 'react' import { addProductToCart } from '../features/cartSlice' import FetchApi from './fetchApi/FetchApi' import LoadingSpinner from './LoadingSpinner' import { useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import '../styles/productcard.css' const ProductCard = ({products}) => { const [cart, setCart] = useState(false) const dispatch = useDispatch() return ( <>
{products.loading && } {!products.loading && products.error ?

Error : {products.error}

: null} {products.products.map(product => (
{product.productName}

{product.productVersion}

{`${product.productPrice}/- Rs`}
dispatch(addProductToCart(product))}>
))}
) } export default ProductCard
